Professor Gina Brown is a Consultant Radiologist and Professor of Gastrointestinal Cancer Imaging at Imperial College. Over her career, she has made significant contributions to the field of colorectal cancer
Professor Brown's work has been recognized globally, and she has contributed to several guidelines and initiatives aimed at improving cancer care
